neighborhood_overview:
Eat & Drink

If we had to bet, we’d guess that Highland has one of the highest numbers of food and beverage offerings per capita of any neighborhood in Denver. The area is home to celebrated local restaurants like Spuntino and Cart-Diver; one of the city’s first food halls, Avanti Food & Beverage; and trendy additions such as Daughter Thai Kitchen & Bar and Señor Bear.

That doesn’t mean you can’t find history here. Lechuga’s Italian Restaurant has been around since 1961, and My Brother’s Bar (add a burger to your beer order) is the city’s oldest bar—it’s been operating since 1873.

Imbibers can stroll almost anywhere in the ’hood and find plenty of venues to enjoy craft brews (Denver Beer Co.) or craft cocktails (Lady Jane, Room for Milly) or locally made spirits (Mythology Distillery, the Family Jones Spirit House) or coffee (Queensberry Coffee, Pinwheel Coffee).

Catch a Show

Beautifully renovated cozy space with high ceilings and historic charm as well as the luxe finishes and services that you expect to find in top-tier hotels (marble tiled bathroom, spa-like walk-in shower, heated floors, weekly housekeeping service). Has an eat-in Kitchen w/ quartz countertops, gas-cooktop, microwave, under-counter refrigerator, & all the essentials. 2 Smart TVs, FREE Premium Cable & Wifi included!
neighborhood_overview: We are centrally located and in the middle of it all but on a quiet tree-lined street. See photos for a view of our block with it's Victorian houses typical of the Wyman historic district, and note that this building is an actual listed historic Landmark property!   You can have the best of both worlds:  a quiet residential getaway in the heart of the city .....yet still close to the premier shopping areas in Cherry Creek, the nearby restaurants & bars on 17th St and Colfax, and only a few blocks away from museums and parks (including the Botanic Garden), and a 10 min walk to/from the City Park Farmers Market.  **Note there is ample FREE on-street parking all around us and on Race St**
host_about: I'm passionate about giving guests a 5-star hotel-style experience:  from the peace & quiet, to the total privacy they enjoy here starting with self-check-in .  We provide  top notch furnishings, premium linens, cableTV,  fast FREE Wifi, replenishment of EVERYTHING you need,  & weekly housekeeping --  all to exceed guest expectations!  No need to buy soap, re-stock your coffee bar, or take out your trash when you stay at our "Pineapple House" :-)

name: Modern Lux! Walk to RiNo’s Best Bars & Restaurants
description:
Walk to Denver's best restaurants, breweries, Coors Field & River North (RiNo to the locals)! 5 min to Downtown, Convention Center & Union Station.

Stunning, Modern Townhome designed with entertaining in mind! EPIC Rooftop deck w/hot tub, fire table, gas grill and plenty of seating. Open living/kitchen/dining area is perfect for entertaining.

Hot Tub
Rooftop Deck
GARAGE Parking - 2 cars
Chef's gourmet kitchen
Dining table seats large groups
3 dedicated work spaces
FAST WiFi
Walk Score - 97!
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood has an abundance of galleries, restaurants, bars, live music venues, and is conveniently located to everywhere you'd want to go to enjoy Denver. It is a favorite of both locals and visitors for it's walkability and and cool vibe.

Located in Five Points, one of Denver's oldest and most historical neighborhoods, rich with culture, and formally know as the "Harlem of the West".

Curtis Park, within Five Points, is a charming historical district with a vast park where you can enjoy summer concerts while strolling with a picnic basket on your arm.

Walkable access to many attractions including :
- Denver's finest restaurants and breweries (less than half a mile)
- Coors Field (0.6 miles)
- The Convention Center (0.9 miles)
- Curtis Park (0.6 miles)
- RiNo (0.3 miles).
- Union Station (1 mile)
- Empower Field at Mile High (1.2 miles)
- 1.4 miles to Ball Arena

We are only a five-minute drive
host_about:
We love to travel and enjoy different cultures.  

We also love living in the center of Denver and all the bars, restaurants and entertainment in the neighborhood.

We enjoy hosting and want everyone to have an amazing time in Denver and make great memories with friends and family.

name: Spacious Ranch with Light Rail Access, 10 Guests
description: Welcome to the ideal home base for your South Denver adventure! Situated just minutes from the Denver Tech Center, the University of Denver, and Colorado Station Light Rail, you’re perfectly located to explore the area. Get two fully equipped units in one charming home, boasting a total of 5 bedrooms, perfect for family gatherings or extended stays. With two dining rooms, a fenced backyard, and proximity to Denver Tech Center and more. This is your ideal base for exploring.
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to University Hills, often described as Denver’s peaceful neighbor. It’s the perfect spot for those looking for a quaint suburban lifestyle with the hustle and bustle of Denver nearby.

Hit up South Colorado Boulevard (just minutes away) to indulge in the local foodie scene and shopping. The area is well-known for its delicious, authentic Mediterranean and Middle-Eastern cuisine. You won’t go hungry in this neighborhood! If you’re looking to stroll, check out Eisenhower Park or Highline Canal Trails for great views as you soak up the beautiful Colorado weather.

Local eateries that are a short walk away:
Gyros Town Restaurant (0.4 miles) - Delicious gyros, gooey baklava, and crave-worthy Mediterranean dishes.
Junction Food Hall & Drinks (0.5 miles) - Twelve food and beverage concepts serving dishes ranging from empanadas and tacos to pizzas and burgers, to gelato and coffee.
Baghdad Restaurant (0.6 miles) - Known for its falafel, shawarma,

neighborhood_overview:
Located in the central neighborhood of Berkeley, this charming home is in the heart of it all, offering easy access to the city's best attractions. Enjoy the best of Denver's vibrant culture with its variety of vintage homes, trendy cafés, unique shops, parks, lakes, biking trails, and diverse music and culinary scene. From casual eateries to upscale restaurants, there is something for everyone in Berkeley. Experience all that Denver has to offer and make lasting memories in this enchanting space!

neighborhood_overview:
"South Broadway has always been a major transportation corridor for Denver, even from its early days as a rough road used for hauling produce into the city. Today, South Broadway and the Baker neighborhood offer an eclectic mix of neighborhood taverns, vintage clothing stores, unique eateries, bookstores, art galleries, international restaurants, craft shops, an arthouse movie theater and hip live music venues.

South of Alameda Street, Broadway becomes "Antique Row," a bargain hunter's dream with an amazing collection of nearly 100 antique stores packed into just 18 blocks. Whether you are looking for something to do or something to buy, there's a good chance you'll find it on South Broadway."
host_about: Life is for living!

name: Italian Villa in LoHi + Free Parking!
description: This beautiful Italian Villa located in the heart of Denver's Lower-Highlands district has an exposed brick wall, imported Italian tile, granite countertops, stained glass, and natural cherry floors. Experience a little taste of Italy in this must-stay two bedroom, one bath with a Romeo & Juliet style balcony that presents a skyline view of Downtown Denver. This home is conveniently located steps away from Union Station and all major sports arenas, while also featuring rare off-street parking.
neighborhood_overview:
Lower Highlands is a trendy and vibrant neighborhood located just northwest of downtown Denver and walking distance from all of the major Denver attractions. Also known as LoHi, this neighborhood offers a unique blend of urban living with a laid-back vibe.

One of the main appeals of LoHi is its impressive restaurant scene, which presents a wide variety of dining options for foodies. From upscale eateries to cozy cafes, you'll find something for every palate here.

Centrally located, LoHi is walking distance to all of the major sporting arenas including the Ball Arena (Nuggets and Avalanche), Coors Field (Rockies), and Empower Field (Broncos). In close proximity to Union Station, LoHi is an ideal destination for those looking to explore all of Denver.

LoHi also has plenty of boutique shops, art galleries, and independent breweries to explore. You can take a stroll down the picturesque streets and discover charming local businesses such as the Highland Hi
host_about:
I love the city of Denver and everything it has to offer. Growing up here I've seen a lot great changes in development, which has resulted in always something to do! 

No matter where my travels take me, I'll always feel I have a home here!

This luxurious basement apartment is all about comfort and location. It is close to downtown, the Empower Field Stadium (Home of the Denver Broncos), Metropolitan State University of Denver, Meow Wolf Denver, Ball Arena, and much more.

You can see the Knox train Station (W line) from the apartment. Use the train to get to Empower Field, Union Station (Downtown) or even the Airport by doing a transfer to A train line.

host_about:

I’m well-travelled, enjoy experiencing other cultures, traditions, foods, etc. I consider myself a very outgoing, honest and friendly person. 

When it comes to traveling, I have a personal travel goal and it is to hit every country in South America in the next couple of years.

name: The Art Bnb in Rino Art District
description:
Welcome to one of the coolest houses in one the coolest parts of Denver.
The newly renovated house is owned by artists and its details are a labor of love. Now it is available for you to enjoy!

The house has three bedrooms - one with a queen and two king Nectar brand mattresses, two spa like bathrooms, top of the line kitchen with all cooking items desired.

The RiNo Art District along Larimer St. is five short blocks away so you may walk to some of Denver's top restaurants & bars.
neighborhood_overview:
The Rino Art District has become one of Denver's most desired areas in which to live, work and play. Along Larimer St., Walnut St., and Blake St. between 25th St. and 36th St. are some of Denver's best restaurants, coffee shops and hippest hangouts. 36th and Larimer St. where the Rino Art District begins, is five blocks away. If desired, you may walk to any of the great places in the neighborhood.

Brasserie Brixton is one of Denver's newest top restaurants, at 36th and Williams St, 1 block from the airbnb. Next door to Brasserie Brixton is the Yacht Club, a great spot for drinks.

In the Rino Art District our favorite restaurants are :
Dinner
Hop Alley - Chinese
Himchuli -Indian and Nepali
Dio Mio- Italian
Mister Oso- South American
Uchi- Top Sushi
Il Posto- Italian
Redeemer Pizza-
Denver Central Market- A large building with several types of restaurants, ice cream, coffee and more.

Breakfast
S

When I'm not working on my house/garden,  I'm hiking or biking with my friends and dog.  I spend lots of time traveling within Colorado and to Scandinavia and New Zealand to see models of how great governments can be!

name: 2 BR Sloan Lake Oasis
description: This 2 BR/1 BA apt is 1/2 of a mid-century duplex on a quiet street in desirable Sloan Lake. Newly renovated, designed, and furnished for your comfort, it offers a peaceful stay while working and playing in Denver.  Delight in the urban/suburban mix of the neighborhood- only 5 blocks to the largest lake park in Denver,  less than 1 mi. to the popular eateries, charming retail, and relaxing coffee shops of West Highland, Jefferson Park, &  Edgewater's Historic 25th St.  Easy commute to Downtown
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood of Sloan Lake is a great mix of urban and suburban living. Considered one of Denver’s most desirable places to live, it is clean and quiet and offers many perks. While there are not a lot of businesses in the neighborhood itself, you are less than 1-mile fromhe popular eateries, charming retail, breweries, and relaxing coffee shops of West Highland, Jefferson Park, and Edgewater's Historic 25th Street. Across the street from the western side of the lake, there is a retail center with Target, King Soopers grocery store, Ace Hardware, Chase bank, gas station, fitness and beauty establishments, and eat-in and fast-food restaurants.
The jewel of the neighborhood, Sloan’s Lake Park, is the largest lake park in the city. With 290 acres of water and a 2.6 mi flat path for running, biking, or walking your pup, this is a well-loved resource. The apartment is just 5 blocks away from the park which offers water activities - motor boating, paddling, fishing- as well as f
host_about:
Pat's a Jersey Girl and Cindy is a Canadian who moved to Los Angeles 30 years ago to pursue her dream.  We now live in both Jersey AND L.A. -- and often Atlanta due to Cindy's work.  We like to say we are bi-coastal (sounds impressive, doesn't it?  ha-ha) When we are both out of Cali for work , we list our Silver Lake apartment on Airbnb.   The Salty V at the Shore is so big, it seemed a waste not to share, so we are listing rooms this summer for the first time.   

We love hosting our Airbnb travelers and knowing our home is well taken care of.  We are going on our 7th year as hosts and it's been a great experience.   
For some reason, we love living in tourist locations. Maybe its because we love hosting friends and family- including our AirBnb family-- as well as exploring the places around us.  OK, we moved to the Jersey Shore for the beach and the food-- there, we said it.  Oh- and we love to gamble. Yeah, that too.  Nothing beats L.A., tho, for the weather and the chill vibe- even in traffic. We love it there too.

We have two fur babies- Nina, our Chi mix, barks too much protecting the perimeter--we are working on that. You can never meet a more friendly dog, tho.  She is the darling of the dog beach.  Our kitty cat Harper Lee is one big sweetie, but shy. You won't see her around much. 

Pat likes to cook and host and hold babies- a natural caretaker.  She also loves the outdoors: camping, swimming, hiking and gardening.  She volunteers when she can-- for animals, people and political causes-tho we won't say which ones :o) 

Cindy,  loves everything about LA, especially the Dodgers.  She has a great deal of knowledge about the city and would be happy to pass along any information to help our guests enjoy their stay there. Cindy works as a TV/Film editor and loves watching TV and going to the movies, of course! 

We are a team, but Pat is usually the one you will talk to when you contact us, and Cindy is the city info expert and technical adviser (if you need to know how to work the remotes, tee-hee).  We are both a phone call or text away for anything you might need (including emergency toilet paper.) Yikes! 

We welcome our guests to enjoy our spaces and hope you are as comfortable as we are.  If there is anything at all we can do for you, just let us know.  We are happy when you are happy.

name: LuvMeDenver - New Spacious Garden Level Apartment
description:
Stay in the heart of the action in our 1500 sqft garden-level apartment, just steps from the best restaurants, coffee shops, and bars in Denver's coolest neighborhood of Berkeley.

Features:

- Private entrance
- Full kitchen with giant island
- 2 king-size bedrooms with ample closet space
- In-unit washer/dryer
- Tons of natural light

You’re steps from:

- Tennyson street
- Coffee shops
- Restaurants serving up everything from breakfast burritos to gourmet dinners
- Shops, bars, and more
neighborhood_overview:
The Berkeley neighborhood in Denver is a trendy and vibrant area known for its lively atmosphere, diverse population, and excellent dining options. Tennyson Street, in particular, is a foodie heaven, offering an array of culinary delights that are sure to satisfy any palate.

Tennyson Street is lined with a variety of restaurants, cafes, bars, and food trucks that cater to a diverse range of tastes and preferences. From gourmet burgers to sushi rolls, tacos to pizza, and everything in between, Tennyson Street has it all.
host_about: Hi there!  My wife and I are both Colorado natives with 2 Frenchies. We are excited to be hosting in Denver's most trendy neighborhood of Berkeley.  We designed and built this property with comfort as our top priority.  Come enjoy a stay in our new, fully custom property.  This location will allow you experience all the best of what the Mile High City has to offer!

name: Aparthotel in RiNo Art District.
description:
Catbird is an independent extended stay hotel in Denver’s RiNo Arts District that blurs the line between hotel and home. It's a welcoming space designed to be every bit as intriguing as its home in the city’s hippest area. Not just a base camp from which to go out and see cool stuff, but one of the very places you look forward to seeing. Put yourself in the heart of the city's vibrant creative center and experience all the feelings that travel should inspire.
PLEASE REACH OUT WITH ANY QUESTIONS.
neighborhood_overview: Denver is a colorful culture capital brimming with art, energy, and local personality, and nowhere is it more evident than in trendy RiNo — the River North Arts District. This is the place where art is made, where culinary delights are crafted, and where progressive ideas are swapped in cozy cafés. Lucky for you, Catbird is right in the middle of it all, sitting pretty in RiNo and serving as your gateway to all that is hip and happening in Denver.

One of the best/well-kept parks in Denver, "Cheesman Park, is just a few blocks away.

name: Walk to Broncos' Stadium-3 BR Contemporary Home!
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space! This 3 bedroom, 2 bath house is perfect for your next Denver visit! Located in the beautiful Villa Park Neighborhood - only a short drive to LoDo, the Highlands and Sloan's Lake neighborhoods, and a quick 10 minute walk to the Bronco's Stadium and Meow Wolf!
The house is located at the end of a cul-de-sac with perfect access to the surrounding park, frisbee golf course, and creek-side bike path. Enjoy your time outdoors in beautiful Colorado!
neighborhood_overview:
We're located in the beautiful Villa Park neighborhood of Denver - only a short drive to LoDo, the Highlands, and Sloan’s Lake. The home is cozily situated at the end of a cul-de-sac with perfect access to the surrounding park, frisbee golf course, and creek-side bike path. We are also a short walk from Mile Hi Stadium and Meow Wolf. Enjoy your time outdoors in the beautiful Colorado sunshine!

The Decatur-Federal RTD light rail station is a short walk from our home so navigating through the city is a breeze! Take the W-line to and from Union Station, with stops at Pepsi Center, Elitch Gardens, and Mile High station along the way.

Take advantage of your proximity to local eateries such as Briar Common Brewery and Eatery, Tap and Burger, breweries like Odell Brewing, Little Machine Beer, and Raíces, as well amazing coffee shops like Brew Culture Coffee - all less than 2 miles away! Federal Boulevard is famous for their Mexican cuisine as well as a variety of Asian
host_about: Lover of the beautiful State of Colorado, passion for service and to bring the best experience to my guests! ;)

name: Entire Guesthouse in Curtis Park
description: Just 4 blocks from Larimer and 3 blocks from Welton, this Curtis Park guesthouse is perfect for your Denver vacation!  Explore the art and nightlife of the RiNo District or enjoy the bars, restaurants, and shops of Five Points. name: NEW Gorgeous Lake Front Property Centrally located
description: Location is just perfect - Opting for a brand new stylish modern private basement apartment on Sloan's lake that is centrally located near to all major Denver attractions. You have found just the place!  Sloan's Lake is a must for  walks, bike riding and exploring many restaurants, breweries, and shops. We love our neighborhood, but we also enjoy that it is so easy and quick to get Downtown ( 5 to 10 minute drive). This private basement apartment is the perfect base for exploring Denver.
neighborhood_overview:
Sloan's Lake is the biggest lake in Denver, and at 177 acres, it's the city's second-largest park. Boasting two playgrounds, tennis courts, multiple athletic fields, boating, basketball courts, multi-use trails, and picnic areas, there is something for everyone at this spot.

In what is known as one of Denver’s most-up-and-coming places to live, Sloan’s Lake Neighborhood possesses choice sunsets, recreational activities, restaurants, modern housing, and a swath of new development. The boundaries are 29th Avenue to the North, 17th Avenue to the South, Federal Boulevard to East, and Sheridan Boulevard to the West. With Denver’s second largest park and the city’s largest body of water, the neighborhood has been a place of interest for Denverites since the lake’s miraculous origin in 1861. Although many of its historic places are no longer standing, their influence is still present in the Sloan’s Lake Neighborhood legacy.

With the breadth of history that has taken plac

description: Location! Location! Location! This Historical downtown, Loft-style apartment is a great place for those looking to truly be in the heart of Denver! neighborhood_overview: Our unit is located in Lodo/Downtown!
host_about:
Welcome to our page! 

We are a hospitality and property management company dedicated to guest experience, fast response times, property cleanliness and an overall seamless and enjoyable stay for our guests. 

We manage everything from luxurious homes to affordable, yet value driven properties. Whether you want to explore the mountains in Colorado, soak up the sun in South Florida or look for longer term stays for business travels, our portfolio has a diverse set of properties in locations nationwide. 

Each property is fully stocked with items such as linens, kitchenware, everyday house hold items and more. Our team is constantly auditing our properties and performing quality control checks to ensure we have everything just right for your stay. Our cleaning partners dedicate themselves to thorough and detailed cleans that match the standard of 5-star hotels. 

Things do happen from time to time and when they do we are right here to answer any questions or concerns. We respond quickly and have a 24-hour response team in those rare emergencies. 

Lastly, hospitality is our number one focus. We are here to answer your questions, guide you through your stay and take care of anything you need.  We want you to have a memorable experience that keeps you choosing us for you next travel adventure!

neighborhood_overview:
The Golden Triangle District is an eclectic community that is home to Denver's most iconic civic and cultural attractions, hundreds of businesses, and thousands of residents.

The vibrant urban mosaic of Denver reverberates here. From perusing new records and vintage clothing, to chowing down on exquisite Cuban cuisine, to marveling at the canvasses of Clyfford Still, the Golden Triangle is where creativity, diversity, and livability collide.

Within the boundaries of the Golden Triangle you can find Civic Center Park, the City and County of Denver offices, the Colorado State Capitol, History Colorado, the Denver Art Museum, the U.S. Mint Museum, the Clyfford Still Museum, and the Kirkland Museum of Fine & Decorative Art. These institutions make up the civic and cultural axes of Denver, accentuating the rich mix of residential living, design offices, art galleries, restaurants, cafes, and retail that surround them.

neighborhood_overview:
Our home is located in the charming neighborhood of Denver, known for its tree-lined streets, beautiful parks, and friendly community. It's conveniently situated near a variety of shops, restaurants, and attractions, providing easy access to everything the city has to offer.

Within walking distance, you'll find a number of great local eateries and coffee shops, as well as grocery stores and pharmacies for your convenience. There are also several parks nearby, perfect for a morning jog or an afternoon picnic.

For those looking to explore Denver's cultural offerings, the Denver Art Museum, Colorado History Museum, and other galleries and museums are just a short drive away. Sports fans will also appreciate the close proximity to Sports Authority Field at Mile High and Coors Field, home to the Denver Broncos and Colorado Rockies respectively.

The neighborhood surrounding the Secret Garden property exudes a sense of community and a welcoming atmosphere. Tree-lined streets, manicured lawns, and well-preserved homes create a picturesque setting that feels both cozy and inviting. As you take a leisurely stroll through the neighborhood, you'll notice the pride of homeownership and a friendly ambiance that permeates the area.

name: Family-friendly Serenity Paradise
description: Centrally located in the heart of Denver, this beautiful 2,489 sq ft. home is a corner lot house with plenty of natural lights. It features (1) an open concept with a vaulted ceiling, (2) three-levels of spacious living space, (3) a formal crib bedroom and playroom for kiddos, (4) home gym space for daily workout, (5) two separate workspace with high-speed WIFI, (6) free Netflix account on us! (7) a decent-sized backyard with outdoor seating, (8) a quiet neighborhood with friendly atmosphere
neighborhood_overview: As a family friendly home, we are close to everything that a family would love. Within walking distance are Crescent Park, Mustang Park, Liberator Park, and Great Lawn Park with play structures for kiddos. Denver Botanic Garden, Denver Zoo, Denver Nature and Science Museum, Stanley Marketplace, and Cherry Creek North and Cherry Creek Mall are all 10-15 minutes away from the home.  Our neighborhood  Lowry is known for its green spaces, such as Sunset Park and Great Lawn Park, offering playgrounds, meadows and summer concerts. Housed in a former aircraft hangar, Wings Over the Rockies Air and Space Museum exhibits warplanes from different eras. Chain stores and casual eateries are the draw at Lowry Town Center mall, while the Big Bear Ice Arena has skate sessions and hockey games. The house is close to all public transportation and is about half an hour to the Denver International Airport.
host_about: We are two data scientists who love numbers (math is the most beautiful language!). When we are not crunching numbers, we love traveling around the world and meeting different people.

name: Lofted Gem: Historic charm in Denver's heart!
description:
Remodeled historic townhouse is in the heart of RiNo; Denver’s most popular neighborhood full of breweries, bars, shops, galleries, restaurants and the best street art.
**The property was built in the late 1800’s, the stairs are a bit steeper than usual.**
-Dog friendly ($50 fee)
-Bright open floor plan
-Ample designated parking
-Fenced yard & inviting outdoor space
-Fully stocked kitchen
-Hi speed wifi
-1 queen bedroom + loft w/ queen murphy bed (perfect for couples) blackout shades
neighborhood_overview: The River North Art District  "where art is made" goes by the nickname of "RiNo" and has even adopted a rhino design for its official logo, so look for creative rhinos in art and signage all around the neighborhood! The district's interesting blend of urban charm and unique industrial revival makes it a great destination for visitors. Historic warehouses and factories now house jazz bars, restaurants, brewpubs, art galleries and working studios. RiNo boasts a diverse mix of creative businesses ranging from visual artists, designers and furniture makers, to craft distillers and brewers, winemakers, creators of unique outdoor gear and small-batch coffee roasters. The art definitely extends beyond gallery walls in this neighborhood, with its colorful and innovative street art murals in alleys and on buildings around almost every corner!
host_about:
I'm a Midwestern girl who is proud to call Colorado home for the last 20+ years. We love to travel the world and host fellow like-minded travelers. 
Life is short. Go explore it!

name: Funky & Colorful Denver Retreat
description:
Welcome to the coolest hideaway in Denver! This funky retreat is bursting with character and charm, promising a one-of-a-kind experience for your group of friends or a family looking for the perfect getaway.

This is the top floor of a duplex, you will share the backyard with the downstairs unit. This unit only has street parking.
host_about:
Hello there! 

Thank you for visiting my host profile!
I was born and raised in Colorado, where I studied ballet and eventually became a professional dancer/performer. This career allowed me to travel the world and discover many exciting places and interesting people. 

Now, I am CEO of Be Our Guest Housing. We aim to provide the best possible experience to all visitors through excellent service and quality local recommendations!. There is nothing more reassuring and calming than finding a place that feels like a second home on your travels.

Feel free to book or message me first; I am friendly, outgoing, and happy to answer any specific questions in advance. You’ll probably find me in great company of family, friends, or my cats when not working. I also enjoy working out, gardening, finding unique and yummy food spots, and seeing live performances.

I am a well-traveled guest who knows what a host should do to create a comfortable experience. My goal is to fulfill these requirements for every guest.

Hope to host you soon!

description:
Master Suite with Rocky Mtn Views
Jr Master Suite with king bed and ensuite full bath
Two living room spaces
Large outdoor lounge space
Quiet Private Large Mature Backyard
Dedicated private office
5-minute drive from downtown Denver
Nestled on a peaceful street with private driveway

Whether you're here for the city's attractions or enjoying the local scenery, our home is your perfect base. Book your stay today and experience Denver like never before!
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to your dream rental in an unbeatable location just 5 blocks away from the popular and bustling Tennyson area! This vibrant neighborhood is bustling with endless activities, day and night.

For families, the nearby Ceasar Chavez park is the perfect place to spend quality time with your kids, enjoying outdoor adventures and creating lasting memories. And on your way back home, treat yourself to some delicious ice cream and a rejuvenating cup of coffee.

When it comes to dining, Tennyson offers an impressive range of options to satisfy all tastes. From casual eateries to exquisite 5-star restaurants, you'll find a variety of culinary experiences that cater to all dietary needs. And if you're a fan of local brews or classic cocktails, you're in luck! This neighborhood is home to several breweries, bars, and two elegant cocktail lounges where you can unwind and socialize.

Shopping enthusiasts will be delighted by the endless retail options available
host_about:
We are veteran Nurses turned Moms and Property Managers who love to travel and explore all things outdoors! Cumulatively we have both lived in Denver for over 20 years and have a wealth of knowledge about things to do in both the city and the mountains. We love sharing our homes with travelers and are always available when you need!
Our Mission at Elevated Properties is to transport your stay above your expectations. 
Cheers! Brooke & Anna

name: Kasa | 1BD, 28+ Nights w/ Pool & Gym | Denver
description: Surround yourself with the vibrant culture and arts of Denver's River North neighborhood at Kasa RiNo Denver. Just steps from the South Platte River Trail and a mile from Downtown Denver, our apartments offer exclusive amenities like a resort-style pool, rooftop deck with grilling stations, fitness center, and more. Our tech-enabled apartments offer self check-in at 4pm, 24/7 guest support by text, phone, or chat, and a Virtual Front Desk accessed via mobile device.
neighborhood_overview:
The RiNo neighborhood is in the Five Points area of Denver, which features some of the best dining and nightlife in town. Grab a bite to eat or a drink at any of the hip local restaurants, like Biker Jim's Gourmet Dogs, and catch a show at the Roxy Theatre. If you prefer to eat outside, walk two blocks to Larimer Square and choose from many outdoor options like Rioja, Tamayo or Colorado's first brewpub, the Wynkoop Brewing Company.

Don’t miss out on our favorite neighborhood spots:
- King Soopers Grocery, 0.8 miles away
- Coors Field, 1.0 miles away
- Denver Central Market, 1.1 miles away
- Confluence Park, 1.4 miles away
- Root Down Restaurant, 1.5 miles away
host_about: Kasa Living offers convenient, tech-forward apartments, hotel rooms, and homes for short- or long-term stays. We are your home on the road. Kasas are available in cities across the United States, with new locations opening frequently. And our dedicated guest experience team is here for you 24/7 if there’s anything you need. We look forward to hosting you!

name: Stunning Denver RiNo Home
description: Enjoy a stylish & comfortable experience at this centrally-located Denver home. 3 bedroom/3 bath house with everything you need for a stay in the city. Fully stocked kitchen, closets in every bedroom, all linens & bathroom essentials provided, kids toys & books and a relaxing rooftop deck for catching the sunset. Located on a quiet cul-de-sac in the Whittier Neighborhood, we are a 5 min drive to RiNo district and Coors Field. Just 2 miles northeast of downtown.
neighborhood_overview:
You will be staying in the Whittier neighborhood of Denver, just 2 miles northeast of Downtown Denver. The historic district has a residential feel that’s missing from some of its bordering ’hoods; many of the area’s beautifully crafted brick homes were originally built for blue-collar workers in the late 1800s. Its high walkability rating, plus the nearby 30th and Downing light rail station, means you will get the best of both worlds: a true community-oriented neighborhood that is close enough to the city to benefit from all of the best urban conveniences.
Just a few blocks to the north you will enter The River North Art District "where art is made" goes by the nickname of "RiNo" and has even adopted a rhino design for its official logo. The district's interesting blend of urban charm and unique industrial revival makes it a great destination for visitors. Historic warehouses and factories now house jazz bars, restaurants, brewpubs, art galleries and working studios. RiNo boasts
host_about:
I am always looking for my next travel adventure!  And have enjoyed staying in so many amazing homes over the last 9+ years with Airbnb.

I am thrilled to host and share my home -- The Art House in Denver, CO!

name: Sonder The Artesian | Accessible 2BR Apartment
description: Location is everything for this industrial-chic property. The Artesian is next door to the best bars and restaurants in LoHi. The unique exterior features paneled steel and rectangular windows for plenty of natural light. Each modern apartment includes a fully equipped kitchenette and Roku TV for streaming. Should you need to freshen your luggage, complimentary laundry rooms are available. Stay at The Artesian for the aesthetic, comfort, and convenience in Denver's hottest neighborhood.
neighborhood_overview: Whatever your passion may be — buzzing restaurants, contemporary art galleries, cute boutiques, or open green spaces — you'll find it all in Denver's unique LoHi neighborhood.  Just minutes from downtown, this area is a melting pot of eclectic restaurants that will please any palate. Grab a craft beer or cocktail at one of the endless captivating rooftops and enjoy gorgeous views of downtown. A short walk across the architectural Highland Arch Bridge will bring you to Commons Park where you can enjoy a day lounging in the grass or playing volleyball with friends.  Don't miss a chance to stay in this inventive and innovative neighborhood.
host_about: Rooms, suites, and apartments in over 40 cities around the world. Every Sonder features designer details, keyless entry, and fast free WiFi. Experience a better way to stay today.

name: Renovated Townhome in prime Denver Location!
description: Welcome to our newly renovated, tastefully decorated, Denver townhome! Located within walking distance to Wash Park, Broadway, and many restaurants & shops, our remodeled 2/1.5 brings the comfort of home with the walkability of city living.   We are a quick drive to all of Denver's hot areas and sporting attractions such as Cherry Creek, Downtown, Rino District and more!
neighborhood_overview: We are located in the Speer/Wash Park West neighborhood
host_about:
Welcome to our page! 

We are a hospitality and property management company dedicated to guest experience, fast response times, property cleanliness and an overall seamless and enjoyable stay for our guests. 

We manage everything from luxurious homes to affordable, yet value driven properties. Whether you want to explore the mountains in Colorado, soak up the sun in South Florida or look for longer term stays for business travels, our portfolio has a diverse set of properties in locations nationwide. 

Each property is fully stocked with items such as linens, kitchenware, everyday house hold items and more. Our team is constantly auditing our properties and performing quality control checks to ensure we have everything just right for your stay. Our cleaning partners dedicate themselves to thorough and detailed cleans that match the standard of 5-star hotels. 

Things do happen from time to time and when they do we are right here to answer any questions or concerns. We respond quickly and have a 24-hour response team in those rare emergencies.

This neighborhood is renowned for its sense of community, where neighbors often gather at the local parks, cafes, and shops. The area attracts a diverse mix of residents, including young professionals, families, and artists, contributing to its unique and dynamic character.

I have three young children, but in my free time (haha), I renovate spaces into places I would love to live. Interior design + traveling are two of my main passions. Before children, I was an avid traveler and explorer. One of my favorite ways to travel was to immerse myself in the culture. Staying at an apartment, vs a hotel, allows one to feel like they live in the new spot. I hope you enjoy staying at my listings.

neighborhood_overview:
Rosedale offers a sparse urban feel and a fun, easygoing lifestyle. The neighborhood is walker and biker-friendly and circles one of Denver’s largest parks, Harvard Gulch Park which boasts a recreation center, grassy areas, trails, a swimming pool, and athletic fields. The home is located just a few block east of South Broadway, where you'll find the neighborhood's best eateries, bars, and shops! You’re also about a mile from South Pearl Street Farmers Market, and close to Washington Park and the DU campus where you’ll find lots of restaurants and places to adventure. Plus, you’re just a short drive from all downtown has to offer.

The Post Chicken & Beer (0.2 miles away) - Upbeat, casual spot serving fried chicken, comfort foods, brews, and cocktails.

name: 2BD/2BR Townhome in Denver/Mountains
description:
Enjoy urban convenience just a 5-10 minute drive from downtown and both Sloans Lake and Mile High Stadium down the street.

2 bedrooms (King - master/Queen - secondary), 2 baths, an in-unit washer and dryer, and a wet bar. Step onto the balcony for fresh air, or head up the spiral stairs to the rooftop oasis. The rooftop offers a covered space with panoramic mountain and cityscape vistas, a Traeger smoker/grill, and a hot tub. Rooftop is weather permitting (Hot tub is currently closed).
neighborhood_overview:
Sloan’s Lake is the biggest lake in Denver, and at 177 acres, it’s the city’s second-largest park. Boasting two playgrounds, tennis courts, multiple athletic fields, boating, basketball courts, multi-use trails, and picnic areas, there is something for everyone at this spot.

Additionally, it’s one of the best parks for catching a sunset, with stunning views of the Rocky Mountains and Denver skyline. Each July, Sloan’s Lake hosts the two-day Colorado Dragon Boat Festival, which is billed as one of the state’s best.

name: Colorful cozy guesthouse 20 mins from Red Rocks!
description: This colorful and cozy guesthouse is located in the Athmar Park neighborhood --one of Denver's best hidden gems. Just blocks away from a stunning lake park with beautiful mountain vistas, only five minutes to the Platte River bike path and a short drive to South Broadway. You'll enjoy the convenience of being 15 minutes from downtown, while also being 25 minutes to the foothills of the Rockies, and only 20 minutes from Red Rocks Amphitheater.
neighborhood_overview: This unassuming, family-friendly neighborhood is located in southwest Denver. Locals know the neighborhood as a hub of Asian culture, encompassing many of the city’s best Vietnamese and Chinese restaurants, as well as the first location of the robust Pacific Ocean Marketplace. You'll find a number of bike lanes cutting through the neighborhood, and there are four parks within neighborhood boundaries, including Huston Lake Park-- which has beautiful mountain views, a playground, and football, soccer, and softball fields and tennis courts.
host_about: My partner Danny and I moved to Denver in 2017, after living in Asia for 4 years. We love traveling but are so grateful to call Colorado home! I do policy work and Danny works in construction. We love backpacking, hiking, biking-- basically all things outdoors! We also love art, music, beer and food and have lots of recommendations for guests. We're here to make your stay as warm as possible and hope you love Denver and Colorado as much as we do!

name: New! Centrl Park Area - Food Scene & Green Space
description:
Our one-bedroom, one-bathroom basement apartment is centrally located in the Central Park neighborhood and is close to all significant Denver neighborhoods of interest. Our place is in a vibrant food scene area with lots of green space to enjoy!

Our apartment is perfect for an extraordinary travel experience to Denver. For in-home entertainment, you can enjoy any of your favorite shows on the smart TV and enjoy a great audio experience on the stereo system.
host_about:
Scott Hemerda is a founding principal and owner of Vacation Rental Collective (VRC), offering premier vacation rentals along the Front Range, including the greater Denver metropolitan area.  As a native Coloradoan, Scott spent his childhood in Littleton, studied at Colorado State University in Fort Collins, and raised his family in Parker. His daily commute to downtown Denver led to a love of the city in addition to his established love of the surrounding suburbs and mountains. Scott worked in financial services as the Director of Institutional Relationships for 18 years at TIAA-CREF, where he managed relationships worth 20 billion in assets. In addition to leading the top performing relationship management team, Scott supported and retained clients through challenging service model and system changes all evidence of his superior relationship management skills.
Scott married his high school sweetheart and they have three children. A lover of sports, he instilled the values of collaboration, teamwork, and good sportsmanship as a role model participating in softball and basketball and then as a coach for all of his children in their numerous activities. Scott grew up skiing and now enjoys hiking and exploring the mountains with his wife. Business trips, family vacations, and romantic getaways have cultivated his love and expertise on the needs of vacationers.

name: Sonder Ceros | Two-Bedroom Apartment
description: Your Mile High adventure begins at Sonder Ceros. Stay in the heart of RiNo — Denver's most popular neighborhood for craft breweries, art, and culture. This newly constructed red brick building was built in 2023 with expansive windows and a modern interior. Each apartment includes everything you'll need for a comfortable stay. Fully equipped kitchens with ceramic backsplash and stainless steel appliances. In-suite laundry and wood-style flooring. And a Roku TV to stream your favorite movies.
neighborhood_overview: From industrial-style warehouses turned bars to an eclectic music and art scene — welcome to River North. Or more commonly known as RiNo. This perfectly positioned neighborhood is just north of downtown and provides easy access to the train station. There are endless craft beers and locally owned breweries, like Blue Moon or 14er Brewing. Explore contemporary art galleries along Larimer Street. Or catch your favorite band or artist at Mission Ballroom, one of Denver’s premier music venues with cutting-edge acoustics. If you’re lucky, you may even find the hidden rhino paintings and structures throughout the area.
host_about: Rooms, suites, and apartments in over 40 cities around the world. Every Sonder features designer details, keyless entry, and fast free WiFi. Experience a better way to stay today.

2 BDR, 1 BA set in an urban neighborhood less than a 10 minute drive from downtown, Mile High Stadium and Meow Wolf! Conveniently located off highway 6 and I-25 for easy access to Golden, Colorado Springs or a venture to the mountains.

neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to our charming Airbnb nestled in the heart of City Park West, one of Denver's most vibrant and historic neighborhoods. With its tree-lined streets, picturesque architecture, and proximity to the sprawling City Park, this area offers a delightful blend of urban convenience and natural beauty.

Location:
Our Airbnb is ideally situated just steps away from City Park, a sprawling 330-acre green oasis that boasts lush lawns, serene lakes, and impressive views of the Rocky Mountains. You'll find yourself in close proximity to some of Denver's most popular attractions, including the Denver Zoo, the Denver Museum of Nature & Science, and the historic City Park Golf Course.

The Space:
The space we offer is a comfortable and thoughtfully designed retreat that can accommodate both solo travelers and small groups. The interior reflects the neighborhood's character, with a mix of modern amenities and classic touches. Relax in the cozy living room after a day

neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to LoDo, Denver's most vibrant and historic neighborhood, where the past meets the present in an exhilarating blend of culture, entertainment, and convenience.

Nestled in the heart of Lower Downtown Denver, this apartment offers you the opportunity to live amidst the city's rich heritage. LoDo is renowned for its iconic red-brick buildings, many of which have been transformed into trendy lofts, shops, and restaurants. From the moment you step outside, you'll be greeted by the charming streets lined with historic architecture and a lively atmosphere.

Your new home is just steps away from an array of dining options, from gourmet restaurants to casual eateries, ensuring that you'll never run out of culinary adventures. Plus, LoDo is a hub for nightlife, with bars, clubs, and live music venues to satisfy every taste.

For sports enthusiasts, you're within walking distance of Coors Field, home to the Colorado Rockies, making it easy to catch a basebal

neighborhood_overview:
Situated near the heart of Denver, the Elyria Swansea area is urban living. This neighborhood is still up-and-coming, it showcases a blend of historic architecture and modern innovation. Amidst the hustle and bustle, you'll find vibrant local markets and art galleries that paint a vivid picture of inner city life, all within easy reach by car. Elyria Swansea celebrates diversity and creativity, making it a captivating and evolving community. Its proximity to both downtown attractions and green spaces welcomes exploration and participation in its spirited transformation.

name: Carriage House in Art District
description:
Built in 2018, Our private accessory dwelling unit (ADU) is an efficiency space located in the Arts District in the La Alma-Lincoln park neighborhood.

La Alma is very centrally located - no car needed. Our modern carriage house is within walking distance to coffee shops, restaurants, museums, downtown and Denver’s light rail transit system.

Our ADU is located behind our home, and is above our garage. We will share the yard space with you and you will hear us come and go.
neighborhood_overview: Our listing is located in the Santa Fe Arts District with galleries, coffeeshops and restaurants two blocks away. It is also easy walking distance to the Denver Art museum, libraries and parks. You can walk to downtown and see a theater show in a 20-30 minute walk.
host_about:
Hi! I’m Lisa, a resident of Denver for more than 18 years, with a brief absence while overseas in Namibia, Africa as a Peace Corps Volunteer. I’ve lived in this neighborhood for 15 years and still love it!

neighborhood_overview:
The RiNo (River North) Art District in Denver is a vibrant and creative hub known for its industrial-chic atmosphere and thriving arts scene. Formerly a warehouse district, RiNo has transformed into a trendy neighborhood filled with art galleries, studios, craft breweries, and eclectic eateries. Murals and street art adorn many buildings, adding to its unique character and vibrant street life. RiNo is also home to innovative businesses, music venues, and cultural events, making it a magnet for artists, entrepreneurs, and urban enthusiasts looking to explore Denver's cutting-edge cultural offerings.

Here are some hospitals near the RiNo District in Denver that traveling healthcare workers might find convenient:
1) Denver Health Medical Center
Distance: Approximately 1.5 miles south
2) Saint Joseph Hospital
Distance: Approximately 2.5 miles southeast
3) Rose Medical Center
Distance: Approximately 3.5 miles east
4) Presbyterian/St. Luke's Medi

name: NEW! Walk Wash Park from our Historical Home!
description:
Location! Location! Location!
Welcome to our renovated 3/2.5 historical home located just 2 blocks from the ever popular Wash Park! Our home is fully stocked with all of the essentials needed for longer stays - A perfect home away from home.
neighborhood_overview: Located in West Wash Park
host_about:
Welcome to our page! 

We are a hospitality and property management company dedicated to guest experience, fast response times, property cleanliness and an overall seamless and enjoyable stay for our guests. 

We manage everything from luxurious homes to affordable, yet value driven properties. Whether you want to explore the mountains in Colorado, soak up the sun in South Florida or look for longer term stays for business travels, our portfolio has a diverse set of properties in locations nationwide. 

Each property is fully stocked with items such as linens, kitchenware, everyday house hold items and more. Our team is constantly auditing our properties and performing quality control checks to ensure we have everything just right for your stay. Our cleaning partners dedicate themselves to thorough and detailed cleans that match the standard of 5-star hotels. 

Things do happen from time to time and when they do we are right here to answer any questions or concerns. We respond quickly and have a 24-hour response team in those rare emergencies. 

Lastly, hospitality is our number one focus. We are here to answer your questions, guide you through your stay and take care of anything you need.  We want you to have a memorable experience that keeps you choosing us for you next travel adventure!

host_about:
Welcome to our page! 

We are a hospitality and property management company dedicated to guest experience, fast response times, property cleanliness and an overall seamless and enjoyable stay for our guests. 

We manage everything from luxurious homes to affordable, yet value driven properties. Whether you want to explore the mountains in Colorado, soak up the sun in South Florida or look for longer term stays for business travels, our portfolio has a diverse set of properties in locations nationwide. 

Each property is fully stocked with items such as linens, kitchenware, everyday house hold items and more. Our team is constantly auditing our properties and performing quality control checks to ensure we have everything just right for your stay. Our cleaning partners dedicate themselves to thorough and detailed cleans that match the standard of 5-star hotels. 

Things do happen from time to time and when they do we are right here to answer any questions or concerns. We respond quickly and have a 24-hour response team in those rare emergencies. 

Lastly, hospitality is our number one focus. We are here to answer your questions, guide you through your stay and take care of anything you need.  We want you to have a memorable experience that keeps you choosing us for you next travel adventure!

name: Designer's Lake Lounge
description: Welcome to my Sloan's Lake home! This place is all about comfort with 3 luxury beds, a washer-dryer, and roomy bathroom. I am exceptionally pet-friendly with a big fenced yard for your furry pals and a cozy patio and fire pit for the humans. I'm in a walkable neighborhood, steps from coffee shops, restaurants, and Odell's brewery! Just a short drive to downtown Denver and half a block from Denver's largest lake, Sloan's lake. Ready for mountain adventures? I-70 access is easy from this location!
neighborhood_overview:
Sloan's Lake is a awesome location. Walkable to a bunch of restaurants that are around the lake, also close to fun little neighborhood main streets (Highlands Square and Edgewater).

This side of Sloan's gives you easy access to the I-70 corridor for Redrocks (15 min away) and all things mountains.

Ask your host for dinner/activity recommendations!
host_about: Hello! I'm Sarah, born and raised in Colorado. How to describe myself, hmmm. Think Martha Stewart with a twist of Rocky Mountain air. I'm oddly good at all things crafting and cooking. I'm also a passionate real estate agent, dedicated to helping people find their slice of freedom. And when I'm not matching people with their dream homes, I'm laughing along to stand-up comedy or exploring the mountains with Mia, my big, opinionated mutt!

Rise & Shine: A North Carolina themed biscuit company with daily biscuit specials that are mouthwatering and delicious.

name: Charming Denver Bungalow near Sloan lake!
description: Immerse yourself in our updated and charming Denver Bungalow! Our multi-level home offers plenty of comfort and space for those traveling with friends and family. host_about:
Welcome to our page! 

We are a hospitality and property management company dedicated to guest experience, fast response times, property cleanliness and an overall seamless and enjoyable stay for our guests. 

We manage everything from luxurious homes to affordable, yet value driven properties. Whether you want to explore the mountains in Colorado, soak up the sun in South Florida or look for longer term stays for business travels, our portfolio has a diverse set of properties in locations nationwide. 

Each property is fully stocked with items such as linens, kitchenware, everyday house hold items and more. Our team is constantly auditing our properties and performing quality control checks to ensure we have everything just right for your stay. Our cleaning partners dedicate themselves to thorough and detailed cleans that match the standard of 5-star hotels. 

Things do happen from time to time and when they do we are right here to answer any questions or concerns. We respond quickly and have a 24-hour response team in those rare emergencies. 

Lastly, hospitality is our number one focus. We are here to answer your questions, guide you through your stay and take care of anything you need.  We want you to have a memorable experience that keeps you choosing us for you next travel adventure!

name: Luxe modern 6,500 sq ft house - situated on park
description:
NEW LISTING - Welcome to your luxurious modern 6,500-square-foot, 7 bedroom, 7 bath home in the popular Central Park (formerly known as Stapleton) neighborhood in Denver. Your vacation house faces a park and boasts soaring 20 foot ceilings that add to the volume of this spacious home.

Explore the park right out the front door and stroll around nearby town centers with loads of local shops and restaurants. The house is central to the airport and downtown Denver.
neighborhood_overview:
Central Park (previously Stapleton) is the largest neighborhood within the city of Denver. It's a master planned urban community boasting 50 parks, 7 pools, several shopping districts with a variety restaurants, and a city of Denver recreation center.

The house is located on a park and open space, and just two blocks from a neighborhood pool. To the north less than half a mile, is the Rocky Mountain National Wildlife Refuge. The refuge is home to a herd of buffalo, and a variety of other wildlife. There are paved and unpaved trails right out the front door.
host_about:
We’re passionate about sharing the Outer Banks. Our family is deeply connected to the local surf culture, with our kids working at surf shops and teaching surf lessons. In the winter,  we head back to our home in Denver, Colorado, trading surfboards for snowboards.

Our beach vacation rentals are a way of giving others access to what we adore most about this place and we hope they help you create lasting memories, just like we have.

name: New! Urban Oasis in Trendy Baker Neighborhood
description:
Our one-bedroom, one-bathroom corner townhouse boasts a contemporary interior highlighted by stunning exposed brick walls and high ceilings, creating an industrial-chic ambiance. Located perfectly to restaurants and all that downtown Denver has to offer!

Bed Configuration:
Main Bedroom - Queen Bed

This home is pet-friendly! We allow a maximum of 2 dogs max, and the pet fee is $40/day (for a max of $250 per stay).
host_about:
Scott Hemerda is a founding principal and owner of Vacation Rental Collective (VRC), offering premier vacation rentals along the Front Range, including the greater Denver metropolitan area.  As a native Coloradoan, Scott spent his childhood in Littleton, studied at Colorado State University in Fort Collins, and raised his family in Parker. His daily commute to downtown Denver led to a love of the city in addition to his established love of the surrounding suburbs and mountains. Scott worked in financial services as the Director of Institutional Relationships for 18 years at TIAA-CREF, where he managed relationships worth 20 billion in assets. In addition to leading the top performing relationship management team, Scott supported and retained clients through challenging service model and system changes all evidence of his superior relationship management skills.
Scott married his high school sweetheart and they have three children. A lover of sports, he instilled the values of collaboration, teamwork, and good sportsmanship as a role model participating in softball and basketball and then as a coach for all of his children in their numerous activities. Scott grew up skiing and now enjoys hiking and exploring the mountains with his wife. Business trips, family vacations, and romantic getaways have cultivated his love and expertise on the needs of vacationers.

name: Explore CO - Epic Mntn views/central/hot tub
description:
Enjoy the new updates and a fully remodeled bathroom with a soaker tub. Being at the top of the hill in the Regis neighborhood provides us with beautiful sunsets and mountain views. With its convenient proximity to major highways, you'll have easy access to downtown Denver, Old Town Arvada, DIA, as well as the breathtaking Rocky Mountains. It is within walking distance from the Regis Campus.

Enjoy a complimentary trip to the Denver Botanic Gardens on us!
neighborhood_overview:
Regis, a rectangular neighborhood that covers the city’s northwesternmost corner, jumped back on this list (last appearance: 2020) with 18.75 percent growth in average home sale prices over the past year. Young professionals and families have flocked to the area as it remains within city limits but is considerably cheaper than Berkeley, its popular neighbor to the south.

While there are no Denver Public Schools within Regis’ borders, the area does share its name with Regis University, a private Jesuit institution with lovely grounds. The area is perhaps best known for the beautiful, public Willis Case Golf Course. It’s slim pickings when it comes to retail around these parts, but there are a handful of enjoyable neighborhood eateries and adjacent neighborhoods have plenty to share.

Eat and Drink

description:
Located blocks from the hip Highland Square and LoHi, this fully remodeled Highland home offers luxury finishes with an outstanding open floor plan, large kitchen, amazing outdoor space, 5 beds and 4 full bathrooms.

• 3 car garage ($10/day of use)
• Office/workspace w/ two curved monitors

neighborhood_overview:
West Highland provides a convenient haven for its lucky residents and a charming dining and shopping destination for all. Bound by Sheridan to the west, Federal to the east, 38th Avenue to the north and 29th Avenue to the south, West Highland is the true heart of the Highlands. Not only is it the area’s original central neighborhood, it’s also enjoying a strong and steady renaissance as one of Denver's hottest neighborhoods. The neighborhood is bursting with a mix of distinctive architecture — including artful Bungalows, Victorians, Denver Squares, Classic Cottages and quite a bit of new construction as well. Locals love the pace of life in West Highland with its tree-lined streets and friendly neighbors.

name: The Garden Room - Queen Anne Bed & Breakfast
description:
With an emphasis on green design, our rooms at The Queen Anne provide both stylish comfort and eco-sensitivity. While staying with us, you can expect to find everything you need to make your room a home away from home. You won’t want to leave this charming, one-of-a-kind place.

Enjoy the afternoon sun with a beautiful view of our gardens in The Garden Room. The room is furnished with a Queen bed, loveseat, full bath with tub/shower, and a private work station.
neighborhood_overview: We are located on the eastern edge of Downtown Denver, about 7 blocks from the 16th St. Mall, and about 1 mile from Union Station. There is a small park, Benedict Fountain Park, across the street from the B&B. We are a short walk (4 blocks) from many excellent restaurants and bars in the Uptown District on 17th St. The State Capitol is about a 15 minute walk from the B&B and the Denver Art Museum and History Colorado Center are 1 mile south of us. The Denver Botanic Gardens are 2 miles southeast of us and the Denver Museum of Nature and Science is 2.5 miles to the east.
host_about: Welcome to our quiet, urban oasis in the heart of Downtown Denver, where historical architecture breathes new life. The Queen Anne Bed and Breakfast is a refreshing blend of innovative design with the environment and local community in mind.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: The Columbine Room - Queen Anne Bed & Breakfast
description:
With an emphasis on green design, our rooms at The Queen Anne provide both stylish comfort and eco-sensitivity. While staying with us, you can expect to find everything you need to make your room a home away from home. You won’t want to leave this charming, one-of-a-kind place.
The Columbine Room overlooks the garden with an 1850's Tester Queen size bed with partial canopy. The room is also furnished with a full bath with tub/shower and a private work station.
neighborhood_overview: We are located on the eastern edge of Downtown Denver, about 7 blocks from the 16th St. Mall, and about 1 mile from Union Station. There is a small park, Benedict Fountain Park, across the street from the B&B. We are a short walk (4 blocks) from many excellent restaurants and bars in the Uptown District on 17th St. The State Capitol is about a 15 minute walk from the B&B and the Denver Art Museum and History Colorado Center are 1 mile south of us. The Denver Botanic Gardens are 2 miles southeast of us and the Denver Museum of Nature and Science is 2.5 miles to the east.

neighborhood_overview:
The Baker Neighborhood in downtown Denver is a vibrant, eclectic area known for its rich history and artistic flair. It features a mix of charming Victorian homes, modern lofts, and local boutiques. The streets are lined with an array of trendy coffee shops, craft breweries, and diverse restaurants, making it a popular spot for both locals and visitors.

Baker is home to several parks, providing green spaces for relaxation and recreation. The neighborhood also has a strong arts scene, with galleries and murals that reflect its creative spirit. With easy access to public transportation and proximity to downtown, Baker combines a laid-back atmosphere with urban convenience, making it a desirable place to live and explore.
host_about: We are a duo of sisters helping manage our family homes! We both were born and raised in Denver, Colorado so we have a lot of local tips to give! We both love to travel, and have been all over the world! One fun fact is we have driven to all 48 continental US states!

name: West Denver Home | Pet Friendly!
description:
All the comforts of home in this fresh, newly remodeled Bungalow! Located in the heart of W. Denver it's the perfect spot for you & your guests to gather & explore all that Denver has to offer. The spacious backyard is also equipped with lawn games such as corn hole and horseshoe!

→ Pet Friendly
→ Fully Fenced back yard
→ Fully Equipped Kitchen
→ Self Check-in
→ Easy access Mountains
→ 10-15 Minutes to Highlands, Downtown, RiNo, Coors Field
→ 5-10 min drive to Highlands/Tennyson
neighborhood_overview:
Denver is a fantastic four-season destination - from world class outdoor adventures, live music, hiking, sports, cuisine and breweries. In addition, easy access to the mountains and many ski slopes.

Our home is located near Athmar Park & Baker, one of Denver's hottest culinary districts just minutes from downtown, and a short drive to the famous Santa Fe Art District and the eclectic vibe of South Broadway shops and dining. Close by are many biking paths, shops and dining. Down the street, you will find a large park with scenic mountain views, a lake, pickleball courts, tennis, basketball, and a soccer field. Our home is located on a quiet street, where you can enjoy the peaceful tranquility of our backyard oasis, while also being minutes away from the many wonderful activities Denver has to offer.

name: WalkScore 99 | Safe Urban Living | Community Pool
description:
Welcome to our spacious 1500 sf upper level duplex! This bright, centrally-located residence offers an Ensuite primary King bedroom and two queen bedrooms, plenty of room for up to 6 guests. With a fully equipped kitchen and new appliances, all you need is a suitcase and toothbrush to feel at home. Flexible monthly rent options available.

2 min walk to Sloans Lake Park
5 min walk to 32nd & Lowell
2 miles to downtown

Learn More Below!
neighborhood_overview: This home is located in Sloans Lake in the heart of Denver; a historical urban pedestrian/biking community that allows access to additional amenities for guests including 2 lakes, public recreation centers and pools, a municipal golf course, and hiking trails. There are numerous bike routes threaded into the roads for easy alternative transportation lovers. Downtown Denver, Ball arena, Broncos Stadium, Rockies Stadium, Bluebird, Fillmore, Orpheum Theaters and Mission Ballroom are less than a 10 minute drive away and the world famous Red Rocks are just 15 miles to the west!
host_about:
We are veteran Nurses turned Moms and Property Managers who love to travel and explore all things outdoors! Cumulatively we have both lived in Denver for over 20 years and have a wealth of knowledge about things to do in both the city and the mountains. We love sharing our homes with travelers and are always available when you need!
Our Mission at Elevated Properties is to transport your stay above your expectations. 
Cheers! Brooke & Anna

Beautiful 4 story, 4 bedroom home with +3000 square feet in the heart of LoHi!

Explore the area by easily walking to all the coffee shops, bars and restaurants LoHi has to offer.

Want to venture downtown? Only a 1 mile walk.

Sports fan? Easily walk to Coors Field (1.1 mi), Ball Arena (1.5mi) and Broncos Stadium (1.9 mi).

name: Local Artist Suite #1 - Queen Anne Bed & Breakfast
description: With an emphasis on green design, our rooms at The Queen Anne provide both stylish comfort and eco-sensitivity. While staying with us, you can expect to find everything you need to make your room a home away from home. You won’t want to leave this charming, one-of-a-kind place. Local Artist Suite One: Rachel Znerold, has a King size bed, tv, mini-fridge, and a gas fireplace. The room also has a seating area, a bathroom with a whirlpool tub and shower combo, and a private working station.
neighborhood_overview: We are located on the eastern edge of Downtown Denver, about 7 blocks from the 16th St. Mall, and about 1 mile from Union Station. There is a small park, Benedict Fountain Park, across the street from the B&B. We are a short walk (4 blocks) from many excellent restaurants and bars in the Uptown District on 17th St. The State Capitol is about a 15 minute walk from the B&B and the Denver Art Museum and History Colorado Center are 1 mile south of us. The Denver Botanic Gardens are 2 miles southeast of us and the Denver Museum of Nature and Science is 2.5 miles to the east.

name: Sonder at Skyline | Superior 1BR w/ Balcony
description: Welcome to Skyline — more than a stay, it's an experience. This property was newly built in 2023 and perfectly borders the Highland, Downtown, and Jefferson Park neighborhoods. You can work up a sweat in the fitness center and then cool down in the pool. Each apartment features floor-to-ceiling windows, in-suite laundry, and a Roku for streaming. You'll be a three-minute drive to Empower Field and Ball Arena. Whether you're here for a game or Mile High vibes, Skyline has you covered.
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to the Highland. Located just northwest of downtown, this walkable neighborhood showcases the essence of Denver: Rocky Mountain views, trendy dining, and stylish boutiques. There’s Highlands Square Farmer’s Market along 32nd Street for seasonal culinary delights. Nurture Marketplace has a bit of everything with organic meals, local vendors, and wellness providers. And with close proximity to Sloan’s Lake Park, there are plenty of opportunities for outdoor activities. In Highland, there’s something for everyone.
host_about: Rooms, suites, and apartments in over 40 cities around the world. Every Sonder features designer details, keyless entry, and fast free WiFi. Experience a better way to stay today.

name: Private Highland Suite I Sleeps 8 I 5-Star Area
description:
This fully remodeled Highland home offers luxury finishes with an outstanding open floor plan. Your private suite provides access to the main floor, kitchen, an amazing outdoor space, 4beds/4baths and the entire 2nd floor. A value that cannot be beaten!

•3-car garage: $10 per day
• Office/workspace w/ two curved monitors
• Fast Internet (1gb)
• Amazing walkability (75 WalkScore)
• High end finishes and appliances
• Dual split Furnace / AC (upstairs / downstairs)
• 3 Queens, 1 King bed
neighborhood_overview:
West Highland provides a convenient haven for its lucky residents and a charming dining and shopping destination for all. Bound by Sheridan to the west, Federal to the east, 38th Avenue to the north and 29th Avenue to the south, West Highland is the true heart of the Highlands. Not only is it the area’s original central neighborhood, it’s also enjoying a strong and steady renaissance as one of Denver's hottest neighborhoods. The neighborhood is bursting with a mix of distinctive architecture — including artful Bungalows, Victorians, Denver Squares, Classic Cottages and quite a bit of new construction as well. Locals love the pace of life in West Highland with its tree-lined streets and friendly neighbors.

name: Boho Bungalow in Denver
description: Come stay at my Boho Bungalow for your next adventure in Denver. The Bungalow is centrally located and close  to downtown, RINO, City Park,  the Denver Zoo,  Botanical Gardens and many other great places to check out in the city. The Bungalow has a great outdoor and enclosed deck/gazebo for you to enjoy. The space is dog friendly and 420 friendly.  This is my home and I like to offer the space periodically. For a touch of old school Denver, come  enjoy a peaceful stay at the Boho Bungalow.
host_about: Hi! I'm Bucy and I am a Denver fan.  I’ve lived here most of my life and owned my house since 1985. I’m a dog sitter now and your’s are welcome here too. As well as loving big dogs, I’m a great fan of large parrots. I’ve been involved in the theater scene since I was in my 20’s.  I love gardening, hanging out with dogs and friends, watching nature from my outdoor deck, and am a big Denver sports teams fan.

name: Landing | Beautiful 1BD in Cherry Creek
description:
Located just one block from the Cherry Creek Shopping Mall, Studio 135 offers convenient access to top-rated dining, art galleries, and the Cherry Creek bike trail. With a safe biking path, you can reach downtown Denver and Washington Park in less than 15 minutes. The nearest bus stop is only a 5-minute walk away, and Colorado Blvd is just 0.5 miles away.

Featuring stylish micro-apartments, Studio 135 provides a minimalist living opportunity.

description: Welcome to our cozy basement apartment, nestled in a serene neighborhood and offering a perfect blend of comfort and convenience for your vacation getaway. This one-level, 900-square-foot haven provides a central stay for your Denver adventures.
host_about:
Scott Hemerda is a founding principal and owner of Vacation Rental Collective (VRC), offering premier vacation rentals along the Front Range, including the greater Denver metropolitan area.  As a native Coloradoan, Scott spent his childhood in Littleton, studied at Colorado State University in Fort Collins, and raised his family in Parker. His daily commute to downtown Denver led to a love of the city in addition to his established love of the surrounding suburbs and mountains. Scott worked in financial services as the Director of Institutional Relationships for 18 years at TIAA-CREF, where he managed relationships worth 20 billion in assets. In addition to leading the top performing relationship management team, Scott supported and retained clients through challenging service model and system changes all evidence of his superior relationship management skills.
Scott married his high school sweetheart and they have three children. A lover of sports, he instilled the values of collaboration, teamwork, and good sportsmanship as a role model participating in softball and basketball and then as a coach for all of his children in their numerous activities. Scott grew up skiing and now enjoys hiking and exploring the mountains with his wife. Business trips, family vacations, and romantic getaways have cultivated his love and expertise on the needs of vacationers.

neighborhood_overview:
Discover Denver's hidden gem, Jefferson Park, just blocks from Mile High Stadium. Experience events at the stadium, like Broncos games and concerts, conveniently located minutes from your doorstep. Enjoy stunning Sloan's Lake views just a short drive away, perfect for sunset strolls.

Downtown Denver is a 5-minute drive, with quick access to 6th Ave for mountain day trips and I-25 for Front Range adventures. Walk to all you need, including a grocery store. Explore nearby neighborhoods on electric scooters or bikes. It's all here!

Enjoy the convenience of being just a block away from a variety of local amenities, including a brewery, fine dining, salons, pubs, pizza, liquor store, and the picturesque Jefferson Park.

Hey there!

I’m Eric Soehngen, a Denver real estate agent and house flipper. Because I grew here, and invest all over town, I know this market like the back of my hand. I welcome all religions nationalities, genders etc with open arms! I’m dedicated to making your short term rental stay AMAZING! 

My goal is to create a comfortable and clean space that makes you feel at home. Convenient locations, safe neighborhoods, coziness & class are what I aim for. Whatever brings you to Colorado, I am here to make sure you have a phenomenal experience.

I am always accessible via the app or by phone for any questions or concerns you may have, and I’m always happy to answer any real estate questions you may have as well!

I look forward to hosting you!

neighborhood_overview: Curtis Park Neighborhood - Blocks from Rino Art District!
host_about:
Welcome to our page! 

We are a hospitality and property management company dedicated to guest experience, fast response times, property cleanliness and an overall seamless and enjoyable stay for our guests. 

We manage everything from luxurious homes to affordable, yet value driven properties. Whether you want to explore the mountains in Colorado, soak up the sun in South Florida or look for longer term stays for business travels, our portfolio has a diverse set of properties in locations nationwide. 

Each property is fully stocked with items such as linens, kitchenware, everyday house hold items and more. Our team is constantly auditing our properties and performing quality control checks to ensure we have everything just right for your stay. Our cleaning partners dedicate themselves to thorough and detailed cleans that match the standard of 5-star hotels. 

Things do happen from time to time and when they do we are right here to answer any questions or concerns. We respond quickly and have a 24-hour response team in those rare emergencies. 

Lastly, hospitality is our number one focus. We are here to answer your questions, guide you through your stay and take care of anything you need.  We want you to have a memorable experience that keeps you choosing us for you next travel adventure!
